name: DevOpsMCP
description: MCP API for DevOps analytics, bug tracking, and automation actions with SQLite database.
_comment: After deploying to Render, replace the 'url' field with your Render service URL

actions.name: get_bug_fix_trends
actions.description: Retrieve statistics and trends for bug fixes over a specified time period.

days_back.description: Number of days to look back for bug fix trends (default: 10)

project_id.description: Optional project ID (integer) to filter bug fix trends. Available: 1=HotRetailSys, 2=PaymentsGateway, 3=MobileApp, 4=DataWarehouse, 5=CloudInfra

project_name.description: Optional project name (string) to filter bug fix trends. Available: HotRetailSys, PaymentsGateway, MobileApp, DataWarehouse, CloudInfra

actions.name: get_projects
actions.description: Get list of all available projects.

actions.name: get_bugs_summary
actions.description: Get summary of bugs, optionally filtered by status.

status.description: Optional status filter (Active, Closed, New, Resolved)

actions.name: health
actions.description: Check API health and database connectivity.
